Name: Titan Nebula
About the game: Space is full of surprises and day to day missions. You're responsible for an Advanced Tactics Mech unit that is perfect for the job of exterminating aliens through abandoned ships. Each task, earn you credits, and you became better at it. An infinite loop. Titan Nebula is a sci-fi procedural spaceship exploration game, where you go into missions in the search for bounty and information. Each mission gives you more loot, access and credits to unlock new weapons and abilities. There is no spaceship equal to one another, so, expect surprises along the way. - PROCEDURAL SPACESHIPS - INFINITE MISSIONS - DIFFERENT ABILITIES TO ADD TO YOUR MECH UNIT, SUCH AS RADAR, BETTER ARMOR, THRUSTERS, AND MORE. - BUILD YOUR PATH: MAIN OBJECTIVES AND SECONDARY OPTIONAL OBJECTIVES AVAILABLE. - IMPROVE THE APPEARANCE OF YOUR MECH AS YOU PURCHASE NEW GEAR
